Edit

Initializes a new instance of the RestoreRequest class.

public RestoreRequest(string location, string id = null, string name = null, string kind = null, string type = null, IDictionary<string, string> tags = null, string storageAccountUrl = null, string blobName = null, bool ? overwrite = null, string siteName = null, IList<DatabaseBackupSetting> databases = null, bool ? ignoreConflictingHostNames = null, BackupRestoreOperationType? operationType = null, bool ? adjustConnectionStrings = null, string hostingEnvironment = null)Public Sub New(location As String, id As String = Nothing, name As String = Nothing, kind As String = Nothing, type As String = Nothing, tags As IDictionary(Of String, String) = Nothing, storageAccountUrl As String = Nothing, blobName As String = Nothing, overwrite As Boolean? = Nothing, siteName As String = Nothing, databases As IList(Of DatabaseBackupSetting) = Nothing, ignoreConflictingHostNames As Boolean? = Nothing, operationType As BackupRestoreOperationType? = Nothing, adjustConnectionStrings As Boolean? = Nothing, hostingEnvironment As String = Nothing)
Parameters
location
String String

Resource Location.

id
String String

Resource Id.

name
String String

Resource Name.

kind
String String

Kind of resource.

type
String String

Resource type.

tags
IDictionary<String, String> IDictionary(Of String, String)

Resource tags.

storageAccountUrl
String String

SAS URL to the container.

blobName
String String

Name of a blob which contains the backup.

overwrite
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

<code>true</code> if the restore operation can overwrite target app; otherwise, <code>false</code>. <code>true</code> is needed if trying to restore over an existing app.

siteName
String String

Name of an app.

databases
IList<DatabaseBackupSetting> IList(Of DatabaseBackupSetting)

Collection of databases which should be restored. This list has to match the list of databases included in the backup.

ignoreConflictingHostNames
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

Changes a logic when restoring an app with custom domains. <code>true</code> to remove custom domains automatically. If <code>false</code>, custom domains are added to the app's object when it is being restored, but that might fail due to conflicts during the operation.

operationType
Nullable<BackupRestoreOperationType> Nullable(Of BackupRestoreOperationType)

Operation type. Possible values include: 'Default', 'Clone', 'Relocation'

adjustConnectionStrings
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

<code>true</code> if SiteConfig.ConnectionStrings should be set in new app; otherwise, <code>false</code>.

hostingEnvironment
String String

App Service Environment name, if needed (only when restoring an app to an App Service Environment).

Gets or sets changes a logic when restoring an app with custom domains. <code>true</code> to remove custom domains automatically. If <code>false</code>, custom domains are added to the app's object when it is being restored, but that might fail due to conflicts during the operation.

Value

Value

Value
